div.p: Greetings. I have received your letter written on the 6th of this month.

From your envoy, you have understood the proceedings of the Diet of Augsburg and have seen the proposal of the king's envoys; I am sending the response. I know you are not disturbed by what they commonly say about peace, since the Lord reigns and governs all things. I hope to see you soon and we will converse.
Greet Mr. Martyr, Mr. Walter, and those who inquire about me. Solothurn, 18th of May.
